sentences.en: A 1913 statute, still on the books, sought to thwart propaganda by forbidding the hiring of "publicity experts, " a ban that has as much to do with modern communication as cuneiform tablets.
sentences.cn: 一项1913年颁布、至今有效的法律旨在通过禁止雇用“公关专家”来阻止宣传，这道禁令涵盖的是从现代通讯到楔形文字泥板的一切。

sentences.en: She wrote hymns to the gods in cuneiform.
sentences.cn: 她用楔形文字写下了献给神祇的颂歌。

sentences.en: The cuneiform script is a great invention by the Sumerians.
sentences.cn: 楔形文字是苏美尔人的一大发明.

sentences.en: The first true writing we know of is Sumerian cuneiform- consisting mainly of wedge-shaped impressions on clay tablets - whichwas used more than 5000 years ago in Mesopotamia.
sentences.cn: 楔形文字是世界上已知最古老的文字。 这是一种刻在陶片上的文字，它的使用者是5000多年以前生活在美索不达米亚平原上的人们。

sentences.en: With the cultural dissemination, other ethnic groups in west Asia and southwest Asia adopted cuneiform.
sentences.cn: 楔形文字传播的地区主要在西亚和西南亚.

words.tran_cn: [解剖][生物]楔形的；楔形文字的；楔状骨的

trans.tran_cn: 〔古代美索不达米亚人使用的〕楔形文字的
trans.tran_en: relating to the writing used by the people of ancient Mesopotamia
